meanings.definition: Undergoing a transformation or change in form
meanings.sent1: The caterpillar was metamorphosing into a beautiful butterfly.
meanings.sent2: The old house was metamorphosing into a modern apartment building.
meanings.sent3: The chameleon thought it was metamorphosing into a pineapple, but it was just the lighting.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were metamorphosing into a whirlwind of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline was metamorphosing into a breathtaking masterpiece at sunset.

meanings.sent1: The metamorphosing landscape showed the effects of climate change.
meanings.sent2: Their friendship was metamorphosing into a deeper bond with each passing day.
meanings.sent3: The old clock on the wall seemed to be metamorphosing into a modern digital version overnight.
meanings.sent4: The small startup was metamorphosing into a global corporation at a rapid pace.
meanings.sent5: The caterpillar's metamorphosing journey from larva to butterfly was truly remarkable.
